name: Shiyani Ngcobo
description: '''Shiyani Ngcobo''' was a [[Maskandi]] guitarist and teacher from South Africa. He toured Denmark, Belgium, Switzerland, Germany, the United States and the United Kingdom during the early 2000s in support of his album ''Introducing Shiyani Ngcobo'' becoming a major influence in taking Maskanda music to international audiences. In addition, he taught maskandi guitar at the School of Music of the [[University of KwaZulu-Natal]]. He died near [[Durban]] on 18 February 2011.
